Class EllipseShape

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Shape
        |
        +--EdgedShape
              |
              +--FilledShape
                    |
                    +--EllipseShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, DrawableElement
public class EllipseShape
extends FilledShape
implements java.lang.Cloneable

The EllipseShape class represents an Ellipse in 2D space specified in integer coordinates. It also contains an edge and fill color specified with a Color object.

See Also:
java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double, Color

writeToStream

public void writeToStream(java.io.PrintWriter stream)
Writes the object's state to a PrintWriter stream. The state is written in the following manner (without any of the comments or the "----"): ---- EllipseShape // the class name // the x coordinate // the y coordinate // the width // the height // the red component of the edge color // the green component of the edge color* // the blue component of the edge color* // the red component of the fill color // the green component of the fill color* // the blue component of the fill color* ---- if the edge or fill color is null, the red component is replaced with "-1" and the green and blue components are not written out.
Overrides:
writeToStream in class Shape
Parameters:
stream - the PrintWriter stream to write the state to
